amendment.description: To extend transfers of excess pension assets to retiree health accounts, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2261 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2261 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S278) To extend transfers of excess pension assets to retiree health accounts, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2261 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2261 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2233.
